subject: Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F: An Invitation from Mathematics and Computer Science: Submit Your Paper to the Journal
body:
Mathematics and Computer Science ISSN Online: 2575-6028, ISSN Print: 2575-6036 Current Issue: Vol.4, No.2, 2019 Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F, We are very glad to read the published article "Immersive Learning Technologies: Research and Future Directions J.UCS Special Issue". We think that Mathematics and Computer Science is in line with your research field. The journal's Editorial Board are inviting you to contribute your valuable unpublished research articles to our journal for publication. Fast Publication Service 01 Fast Publication Service We can release your article online within 4-6 weeks since the submission date. 02 Quickly Reply We deliver the authors timely feedback about each and every submission, and we will deliver prompt replies for every question asked by our authors. 03 Valuable Revision Suggestion Each submitted paper will be carefully scrutinized by more than 3 peer reviewers from all over the world. Authors will receive helpful suggestions from our Professional Reviewers to assist them in further improvement of their papers. How to Submit your Paper 1. Kindly check out the requirements for manuscript preparation and manuscript template at: http://www.mathcomputer.org/submission 2. Get your paper prepared according to the template. 3. Register and submit your article via the submission system. Recommended Journals Over 300 journals in our platform are provided for authors to choose covering disciplines like Materials Synthesis, Microbiology, Cardiology, Green Energy, Data Technology, Arts, Manufacturing Systems, Sustainability, English Language, Applications, etc. Learning more journals, please feel free to visit: http://www.mathcomputer.org/journals American Journal of Electrical and Computer Engineering Mathematical Modelling and Applications American Journal of Computer Science and Technology International Journal of Theoretical and Applied Mathematics Science Journal of Applied Mathematics and Statistics Regards, Amelia Ford Assistant from Editorial Office of Mathematics and Computer Science


Mathematics and Computer Science
ISSN Online: 2575-6028, ISSN Print: 2575-6036
Current Issue: Vol.4, No.2, 2019
Dear Pena-Rios, A; Khosmood, F,
We are very glad to read the published article "Immersive Learning Technologies: Research and Future Directions J.UCS Special Issue". We think that Mathematics and Computer Science is in line with your research field. The journal's Editorial Board are inviting you to contribute your valuable unpublished research articles to our journal for publication.
Fast Publication Service
01
Fast Publication Service
We can release your article online within 4-6 weeks since the submission date.
02
Quickly Reply
We deliver the authors timely feedback about each and every submission, and we will deliver prompt replies for every question asked by our authors.
03
Valuable Revision Suggestion
Each submitted paper will be carefully scrutinized by more than 3 peer reviewers from all over the world. Authors will receive helpful suggestions from our Professional Reviewers to assist them in further improvement of their papers.
How to Submit your Paper
  1. Kindly check out the requirements for manuscript preparation and manuscript template at: http://www.mathcomputer.org/submission
  2. Get your paper prepared according to the template.
  3. Register and submit your article via the submission system.
Recommended Journals
Over 300 journals in our platform are provided for authors to choose covering disciplines like Materials Synthesis, Microbiology, Cardiology, Green Energy, Data Technology, Arts, Manufacturing Systems, Sustainability, English Language, Applications, etc.
Learning more journals, please feel free to visit: http://www.mathcomputer.org/journals
American Journal of Electrical and Computer Engineering
Mathematical Modelling and Applications
American Journal of Computer Science and Technology
International Journal of Theoretical and Applied Mathematics
Science Journal of Applied Mathematics and Statistics
Regards,
Amelia Ford
Assistant from Editorial Office of Mathematics and Computer Science
